item.title: Three Days Without My Laptop
item.author: Lanhsin
item.description: Three days ago, my laptop, which I’ve used faithfully for nearly six years, ran into technical issues. Upon starting it up, I was met with the message: “To interrupt normal startup, press enter.” Given my affinity for technology, I saw this as an opportunity to delve deeper into the workings of my laptop. After some independent research, I discovered others had faced similar issues. Their solution was to access the BIOS system, adjust the optimized defaults, and then restart.
